import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './Account.module.scss' import AvatarMeng from '../../assets/images/AvatarMeng.svg' import { userAction } from '../../redux/actions' const Account = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() // eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars const history = useHistory() const handleSignOutClick = () => { dispatch(userAction.LOGIN({ token: null, })) history.push('/') } return (
